verses.verse: Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> is not shortened, <S%H7114><s%> that it cannot <S%H3808><s%> save; <S%H3467><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> his ear <S%H241><s%> heavy, <S%H3513><s%> that it cannot <S%H3808><s%> hear: <S%H8085><s%>

But your iniquities <S%H5771><s%> have separated <S%H914><s%> between <S%H996><s%> you and your God, <S%H430><s%> and your sins <S%H2403><s%> have hid <S%H5641><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> from you, that he will not hear. <S%H8085><s%>

For your hands <S%H3709><s%> are defiled <S%H1351><s%> with blood, <S%H1818><s%> and your fingers <S%H676><s%> with iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> your lips <S%H8193><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> lies, <S%H8267><s%> your tongue <S%H3956><s%> has muttered <S%H1897><s%> perverseness. <S%H5766><s%>

None <S%H369><s%> calls <S%H7121><s%> for justice, <S%H6664><s%> nor <S%H369><s%> any pleads <S%H8199><s%> for truth: <S%H530><s%> they trust <S%H982><s%> in vanity, <S%H8414><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> lies; <S%H7723><s%> they conceive <S%H2029><s%> mischief, <S%H5999><s%> and bring <S%H3205><s%> forth <S%H3205><s%> iniquity. <S%H205><s%>

They hatch <S%H1234><s%> cockatrice' <S%H6848><s%> eggs, <S%H1000><s%> and weave <S%H707><s%> the spider's <S%H5908><s%> web: <S%H6980><s%> he that eats <S%H398><s%> of their eggs <S%H1000><s%> dies, <S%H4191><s%> and that which is crushed <S%H2116><s%> breaks <S%H1234><s%> out into a viper. <S%H660><s%>

Their webs <S%H6980><s%> shall not become <S%H1961><s%> garments, <S%H899><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall they cover <S%H3680><s%> themselves with their works: <S%H4639><s%> their works <S%H4639><s%> are works <S%H4639><s%> of iniquity, <S%H205><s%> and the act <S%H6467><s%> of violence <S%H2555><s%> is in their hands. <S%H3709><s%>

Their feet <S%H7272><s%> run <S%H7323><s%> to evil, <S%H7451><s%> and they make haste <S%H4116><s%> to shed <S%H8210><s%> innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood: <S%H1818><s%> their thoughts <S%H4284><s%> are thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of iniquity; <S%H205><s%> wasting <S%H7701><s%> and destruction <S%H7667><s%> are in their paths. <S%H4546><s%>

The way <S%H1870><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> they know <S%H3045><s%> not; and there is no <S%H369><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> in their goings: <S%H4570><s%> they have made them crooked <S%H6140><s%> paths: <S%H5410><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> goes <S%H1869><s%> therein shall not know <S%H3045><s%> peace. <S%H7965><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> is judgment <S%H4941><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from us, neither <S%H3808><s%> does justice <S%H6666><s%> overtake <S%H5381><s%> us: we wait <S%H6960><s%> for light, <S%H216><s%> but behold <S%H2009><s%> obscurity; <S%H2822><s%> for brightness, <S%H5054><s%> but we walk <S%H1980><s%> in darkness. <S%H653><s%>

We grope <S%H1659><s%> for the wall <S%H7023><s%> like the blind, <S%H5787><s%> and we grope <S%H1659><s%> as if we had no <S%H369><s%> eyes: <S%H5869><s%> we stumble <S%H3782><s%> at noon <S%H6672><s%> day as in the night; <S%H5399><s%> we are in desolate <S%H820><s%> places as dead <S%H4191><s%> men.

We roar <S%H1993><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> like bears, <S%H1677><s%> and mourn <S%H1897><s%> sore like doves: <S%H3123><s%> we look <S%H6960><s%> for judgment, <S%H4941><s%> but there is none; <S%H369><s%> for salvation, <S%H3444><s%> but it is far <S%H7368><s%> off from us.

For our transgressions <S%H6588><s%> are multiplied <S%H7231><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> you, and our sins <S%H2403><s%> testify <S%H6030><s%> against us: for our transgressions <S%H6588><s%> are with us; and as for our iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> we know <S%H3045><s%> them;

In transgressing <S%H6586><s%> and lying <S%H3584><s%> against the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and departing <S%H5253><s%> away from our God, <S%H430><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> oppression <S%H6233><s%> and revolt, <S%H5627><s%> conceiving <S%H2029><s%> and uttering <S%H1897><s%> from the heart <S%H3820><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> of falsehood. <S%H8267><s%>

And judgment <S%H4941><s%> is turned <S%H5253><s%> away backward, <S%H268><s%> and justice <S%H6666><s%> stands <S%H5975><s%> afar <S%H7350><s%> off: for truth <S%H571><s%> is fallen <S%H3782><s%> in the street, <S%H7339><s%> and equity <S%H5229><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> enter. <S%H935><s%>

Yes, truth <S%H571><s%> fails; <S%H5737><s%> and he that departs <S%H5493><s%> from evil <S%H7451><s%> makes himself a prey: <S%H7997><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it, and it displeased <S%H7489><s%> <S%H5869><s%> him that there was no <S%H369><s%> judgment. <S%H4941><s%>

And he saw <S%H7200><s%> that there was no <S%H369><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> and wondered <S%H8074><s%> that there was no <S%H369><s%> intercessor: <S%H6293><s%> therefore his arm <S%H2220><s%> brought <S%H3467><s%> salvation <S%H3467><s%> to him; and his righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> it sustained <S%H5564><s%> him.

For he put <S%H3847><s%> on righteousness <S%H6666><s%> as a breastplate, <S%H8302><s%> and an helmet <S%H3553><s%> of salvation <S%H3444><s%> on his head; <S%H7218><s%> and he put <S%H3847><s%> on the garments <S%H899><s%> of vengeance <S%H5359><s%> for clothing, <S%H8516><s%> and was clad <S%H5844><s%> with zeal <S%H7068><s%> as a cloak. <S%H4598><s%>

According <S%H5921><s%> to their deeds, <S%H1578><s%> accordingly <S%H5922><s%> he will repay, <S%H7999><s%> fury <S%H2534><s%> to his adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> recompense <S%H1576><s%> to his enemies; <S%H341><s%> to the islands <S%H339><s%> he will repay <S%H7999><s%> recompense. <S%H1576><s%>

So shall they fear <S%H3372><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> from the west, <S%H4628><s%> and his glory <S%H3519><s%> from the rising <S%H4217><s%> of the sun. <S%H8121><s%> When <S%H3588><s%> the enemy <S%H6862><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> in like a flood, <S%H5104><s%> the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall lift <S%H5127><s%> up a standard <S%H5127><s%> against him.

And the Redeemer <S%H1350><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and to them that turn <S%H7725><s%> from transgression <S%H6588><s%> in Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

As for me, this <S%H2063><s%> is my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them, said <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> My spirit <S%H7307><s%> that is on you, and my words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have put <S%H7760><s%> in your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> shall not depart <S%H4185><s%> out of your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> nor out of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of your seed, <S%H2233><s%> nor out of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of your seed's <S%H2233><s%> seed, <S%H2233><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> from now on <S%H3254><s%> and for ever. <S%H5769><s%>
